title: Van Gogh-inspired homepage with unified navigation and expandable sections

requirements.text: Generate a Van Gogh-inspired background image with vibrant, swirling colors and brushstroke textures suitable for a homepage hero section (dimensions: 1920x1080)

quotes: Van Gogh-inspired, with a subtle background image

acceptanceCriteria: Background image features swirling, vibrant colors reminiscent of Van Gogh's style
Brushstroke textures are visible and artistic
Image dimensions are 1920x1080 for optimal display on various screens

requirements.text: Create a new unified HomePage component that replaces the existing HomePage, featuring a Van Gogh-inspired design with CSS effects for swirling brushstrokes and vibrant color gradients overlaying the generated background image

quotes: CSS effects for swirling brushstrokes and vibrant colors
The page should feel unified and artistic

acceptanceCriteria: CSS gradient effects create additional swirling visual elements
Color scheme uses vibrant Van Gogh-inspired colors (yellows, blues, greens)
Page maintains a cohesive, unified artistic feel throughout
Background image is rendered from generated asset in frontend/public/assets/generated

requirements.text: Implement three prominent main menu options in a center or top panel on the homepage: 'Browse Books' (navigates to /browse), 'Mood-Based Recommendations' (expands content on homepage), and 'Trending & Popular' (expands content on homepage)

quotes: Three-Line Main Options: Browse Books – links to the full book catalog page. Mood-Based Recommendations – expands directly on the homepage to show books by mood. Trending & Popular – expands directly on the homepage to show top-rated and trending books

acceptanceCriteria: Three options are visually prominent and clearly labeled
Browse Books navigates to the existing /browse route
Mood-Based Recommendations expands a section below showing mood filters and filtered books
Trending & Popular expands a section below showing trending books using existing useTrendingBooks hook
Expanded sections appear smoothly without page navigation
Only one section can be expanded at a time

requirements.text: Add a secondary menu with links to Collection, Upload Book, My Books, and Favorites, integrated into the homepage design below or beside the three main options

quotes: Secondary Menu / Platform Features: Collection, Upload Book, My Books, Favorites

acceptanceCriteria: Secondary menu contains four links: Collection (/browse), Upload Book (/upload), My Books (/my-books), Favorites (/favorites)
Links are styled consistently with the Van Gogh theme
Menu is visually distinct but complementary to the three main options
All links navigate to their respective existing routes

requirements.text: Ensure the homepage serves as a central entry point and personalized dashboard for logged-in users, showing personalized content in the expanded sections when available

quotes: Homepage Function: Serves as the central entry point connecting both existing platform features and Phase 3 recommendation/mood features, giving logged-in users a personalized dashboard experience

acceptanceCriteria: Logged-in users see personalized recommendations when Mood-Based Recommendations is expanded
Trending & Popular section uses existing trending books logic
Authentication state is checked using useInternetIdentity hook
Non-authenticated users see public content or prompts to log in

requirements.text: Style the homepage typography to stand out clearly against the Van Gogh-inspired background, using consistent font choices and spacing that maintain readability while complementing the artistic theme

quotes: clear typography that stands out against the Van Gogh-inspired background
Use consistent typography and spacing to maintain a uniform design

acceptanceCriteria: Text has sufficient contrast against colorful backgrounds
Font choices are consistent throughout the homepage
Typography complements the artistic Van Gogh aesthetic
Spacing between elements maintains visual hierarchy and readability

requirements.text: Update the App.tsx routing to direct users to the new unified homepage as the default route, ensuring it replaces the current HomePage while maintaining access to PersonalizedHomePage logic for authenticated users

quotes: Homepage Function: Serves as the central entry point

acceptanceCriteria: Root route '/' displays the new Van Gogh-inspired unified homepage
Authenticated user experience integrates personalized content
All existing routes remain functional
Navigation component continues to work with the new homepage

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve all existing backend functionality in backend/main.mo
Maintain compatibility with existing routes and navigation structure
Use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query as defined in the system stack
nonGoals: Modifying the backend actor or data models
Changing the authentication system or Internet Identity integration
Altering existing page functionality beyond the homepage redesign
Adding new backend endpoints or state management

required: Van Gogh-inspired background with vibrant swirling colors, yellows, blues, and greens, featuring prominent brushstroke textures (vangogh-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
